items.name: Torment Glimmer
explicitMods: 1% chance to receive additional Blight items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
4% chance to receive additional Jewellery when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
6% chance in Heists for Orbs of Alteration to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
32% chance in Heists for Chromatic Orbs to drop as Jeweller's Orbs instead
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: 19% reduced Charges per use
24% increased Duration
When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

+25% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
+59 to maximum Life
+24 to maximum Mana
Regenerate 5.3 Mana per second
craftedMods: Non-Channelling Skills have -7 to Total Mana Cost

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that has a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 20% more Damage
Supported Skills have 60% less Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Deals 337 to 505 Cold Damage
Damage cannot be Reflected
Buff grants 40 to 61 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 40 to 61 Added Spell Cold Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.

40% increased Area of Effect
You and nearby Allies Regenerate 203.3 Life per second

items.name: Darkray Vectors
enchantMods: Damage Penetrates 10% of Enemy Elemental Resistances if you haven't Killed Recently

10% increased Evasion Rating per Frenzy Charge

flavourText: "Sirrius flew on wings of light, faster than wind, faster
than thought. But try as he might to outrun the darkness,
it was there, at every turn, waiting for him."

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Slam, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Jump into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: 39% increased Stun Duration against Enemies that are on Full Life
+0.55 seconds to Attack Time
Damaging Hits always Stun Enemies that are on Full Life

explicitMods: Adds 9 to 14 Cold Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the accuracy of nearby allies, and physical damage taken by nearby enemies. Gain stages by killing enemies while carrying the banner. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: 60% less Skill Effect Duration
You and nearby allies gain 31% increased Accuracy Rating
Nearby Enemies take 11% increased Physical Damage
Gain 1 Stage when you Kill an Enemy while carrying the Banner
Gain Adrenaline for 0.05 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Kaom's Spirit
explicitMods: +68 to maximum Life
+26% to Fire Resistance
0.33% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Life Recovery from Regeneration is not applied
Regenerate 1 Rage per second for every 100 Life Recovery per second from Regeneration
flavourText: Who can tell when whispers are truly from a god?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a buff that grants different bonuses to melee skills depending on your stance. Using the skill again alternates between Blood Stance and Sand Stance.

50% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
20% increased Projectile Attack Damage while in Blood Stance

hybrid.secDescrText: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with a powerful cascading slam while you're near it. If the enemies are far away, it will leap toward them as it slams. Being near it grants you more melee damage. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.
